title: Smart Farmer Farming Vegetable With This Technique #satisfying #short

tasks.task: Spray pesticides on crops

subtasks: Evaluate current crop type and weather

subtasks: Push the wheelbarrow from the soil source to the destination

Apply a numbing agent to the goat’s ear
Use specialized tools to create a distinctive mark

tasks.task: Clear the front fence after a storm
subtasks: Inspect the fence for damage
Remove fallen branches or debris

tasks.task: Cut corn using a combine
subtasks: Run the combine with the proper header for corn

subtasks: Wearing gloves, kneel on the soil

tasks.task: Haul manure to the field
subtasks: Attach the manure spreader to a tractor

subtasks: Check weather forecast to ensure conditions are dry

subtasks: Stand with a cane in one hand, walk through the field
Gently poke the recently emerged weeds to eliminate them

subtasks: Install water pipes in the field

tasks.task: Conduct a soil test to assess fertility
subtasks: Collect soil samples from different parts of the field

tasks.task: Collect eggs from a chicken coop
subtasks: Gather all eggs from the nesting boxes

tasks.task: Mark horses for identification
subtasks: Calm the horse by petting and talking

tasks.task: Install electric fencing around field

tasks.task: Set up irrigation pipes

subtasks: Walk through the exhibit hall to view new products

tasks.task: Load hay into a trailer

subtasks: Locate the exact position of the leak

tasks.task: Take off head in a combine

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer using a spreader on a farm truck

subtasks: Secure the spreader onto the tractor

subtasks: Weigh each component of the fertilizer according to the prescription

subtasks: Identify promotion boards or equipment brochures

tasks.task: Create a fenced area for animals during a veterinary procedure

tasks.task: Install a fence to protect crops from wildlife

tasks.task: Rake hay to form windrows for drying

subtasks: Mix the preservative according to instructions

tasks.task: Use a leaf blower to clean debris from the field
subtasks: Set the leaf blower to the proper power setting

tasks.task: Check grain storage bins for moisture levels

tasks.task: Drain puddles in the field to prevent compaction

tasks.task: Use a transplanter to plant vegetable seedlings

tasks.task: Control water runoff by diverting water with fences
